group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:  "I grow weary of being consumed@  by the company of others. Let@  me live in harmony with nature,@  and thus return to the earth...@  At that time, I shall bear the@  memory of my comrades, and at@  least one of them shall, at my side,@  be witness to my departure."]
[textBlack:  "I wish for nothing more than that."]
[textBlack:  "But still, as I said earlier,@  this is the hope I had in days past.@  I don't think that I could live and@  die in such bliss as I am now."]
[textBlack:  "But nobody knows about Magical@  Girls, do they? Which is why I@  don't think I can use this@  misfortune of mine to help@  anyone right now..."]

[textBlack:  "Since I've already had a wish@  granted, some might say I shouldn't@  ask for anything moreâ€• but even@  if we can't be saved, it may be@  meaningful enough to simply@  spread the word about us."]
[textBlack:  "If Magical Girls can live just a@  little longer, I wanna hone my skills@  outside of the diabolo and@  continue performing, even if I@  gotta go it alone."]
[textBlack:  "Once I grow up, I wanna talk@  to Kurara again. See, if our@  hearts have changed, maybe we'll@  be able to communicate this time."]
[textBlack:  "Then we'll get back together@  and show everyone the best@  street performance we got!"]
[textBlack:  "Sis always goes on about how@  I'm so cute, so I'll take the@  safer choice and go with a store!"]
[textBlack:  "I'll sell all kinds of both cheap@  and expensive sweets, make it a@  place where lots of sweets lovers@  can come and be happy,@  even Nayutan and Rabitan!"]
[textBlack:  "And then, one more thing...@  After what's going on in Kamihama@  is over, I'd like to continue on@  with Rabi as we have@  up until now..."]
[textBlack:  "I'm not sure what happened,@  but I have a sense of something@  dark, and I'm worried that she@  might just disappear..."]
[textBlack:  "Since I may have nothing left,@  it's not unusual for me to@  have given up on it all.@  It's normal not to take action."]
[textBlack:  "And yet, I have a vegetable@  garden in my yard.@  That alone gives me my answer."]
[textBlack:  "It tells me I still want a future..."]
